data.name: A Bavarian Tale - Totgeschwiegen Demo
data.detailed_description: Play the first hour of the game and take a peek at what will be in the full release of "A Bavarian Tale - Totgeschwiegen". The demo contains all the features that will be in the full release. A lot of that is not in the Early Access version of the game. If you enjoy the game and want to keep playing we advice you to wishlist and buy the full release in july. There will be a release sale!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: AMD 1600X / Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 270 / GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD 3600X 7 Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 5700 XT / GeForce 2070 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
